thread.title: NASA to reveal major discovery 'beyond our solar system'
thread.title_full: NASA to reveal major discovery 'beyond our solar system'

title: NASA to reveal major discovery 'beyond our solar system'
text:
NASA to reveal major discovery 'beyond our solar system' CTVNews.ca Staff Published Wednesday, February 22, 2017 9:37AM EST 
Astronomers at NASA are poised to announce a major discovery involving planets that orbit a star outside our solar system. 
That’s when more details will be revealed, to coincide with the publication of a a paper on the findings in the journal Nature. 
More to come…
